[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/outsides/desert.c

This is a standard desert room. It is a specialisation of /std/outside providing various ready-made add_items for your desert. room_chats are also provided, if you don't wish to keep them simply use room_chat to write your own or stop_room_chats to remove them.

Written by Ceres

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/inherit/terrain_map/outside_base.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h, /include/terrain_map.h and /include/weather.h
